buffs.description: Increases the Tribe Friendliness for Undead by 10 points for each 5-star Abyss Mage, and 20 points for each 6-star Abyss Mage. It is applied even when Abyss Mage is in Time Shop and does not exceed 400 points. (The medal buff increases as much as the Tribe Friendliness for the Knightage Hero's tribe that you revive from.)
buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness
